description: {"blocks":[{"key":"7fh6o","text":"This protocol describes the steps necessary for the preparation and use of screening plates for the rapid detection of terbinafine resistant dermatophytes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

guidelines: {"blocks":[{"key":"dgp3c","text":"1) When you take the medium out of the autoclave, be as quick as possible to add the terbinafine and transfer the medium to the plate wells. Since the medium contains agar, it will solidify fairly quickly.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b6c8e","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"53uma","text":"2) Work in sterile conditions as much as possible. The medium is very easy to contaminate and can, if so, falsify the results.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ft206","text":"Pour    of this medium into 4 erlenmeyer flasks and label each with final terbinafine concentrations (0.2 µg/mL for the first flask, 0.1 µg/mL for the second, 0.05 µg/mL for the third and 0 µg/mL for the last flask). Using an automated pipettor, add    of the medium that contains    of terbinafine (flask number 1) to all the last wells of the plate.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":113,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":144,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"ocm4","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":2,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"953k4","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6kqdk","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":3,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"5sbrn","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"3","error":false,"guid":"02923ACB8B5F11EC882D0A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"0.2","error":false,"guid":"029238E48B5F11EC882D0A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1873}},"2":{"type":"equipment","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"id":3080,"brand":"DR. LAB","can_edit":0,"guid":"478802E08B6011ECA5F7A59C5CBA3E3A","link":"http://www.drlab.co/index.php?route=product/product\u0026product_id=177","name":"Motorized Pipette Filler","sku":"7033100100","specifications":null,"type":"Levo Plus","vendor":{"id":1430,"name":"Dr. Lab","link":"www.drlab.co","image":{"source":"/img/vendors/placeholder.png","placeholder":"/img/vendors/placeholder.png"}},"file":null,"image":{"id":207988,"source":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/gmdwbqyf7.jpg","name":"levo plus pipette-228x228.jpg","icon":"https://www.protocols.io/img/extensions/jpg.png"}}},"3":{"type":"equipment","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"id":3079,"brand":"Thermo Scientific","can_edit":0,"guid":"4D8054E08B6011ECA5F7A59C5CBA3E3A","link":"https://www.fishersci.com/shop/products/biolite-multidishes-microwell-plates/12556005","name":"Microwell plate","sku":"130185","specifications":null,"type":null,"vendor":{"id":9,"name":"Thermo Scientific","link":"https://www.lifetechnologies.com","image":{"source":"/img/vendors/placeholder.png","placeholder":"/img/vendors/placeholder.png"}},"file":null,"image":{"id":207991,"source":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/gmdzbqyf7.jpg","name":"F161216~p.eps-650.jpg","icon":"https://www.protocols.io/img/extensions/jpg.png"}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4v16s","text":"Cover the plates with their lids and let the medium solidify at room temperature. Label the plates with the corresponding terbinafine concentrations for each well and store at    for future use.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":176,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"412sc","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"828D12008B5F11ECA5F7A59C5CBA3E3A","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"4","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2enck","text":"Using a sterile swab, prepare a suspension (sterile water) 0.5 McF of the dermatophyte to be studied.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9hq1r","text":"Transfer   of this suspension to each of the 4 wells of the plate.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":9,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"4ek2","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"25","error":false,"guid":"49CFD350D7FC11EC8C51590F9EDC9700","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6p1hd","text":"Annotate the plate with the number of the studied strains and incubate at 30°C for 96h before reading the result.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
